entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 11. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries this evening and after midnight. Clearing before morning. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Thursday 02 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Increasing cloudiness. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness in the morning. Clearing late in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 16 in the morning and minus 7 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Thursday 02 March 2023
